sentences.sContent: an attempt to recapture the city

remMethod.val: re (重新) + capture (捕获； 占领) → 重新占领 → 取回, 夺回

trans.tranCn: 夺回；拿回；再体验；政府征收再经历
trans.tranOther: to take control of a place again by fighting for it
